title: Ohio man admits using AI to create child pornography
description: Austin Pittman, 35, faces up to 35 years in prison after admitting to distributing real child pornography and using artificial intelligence to alter images of children.
content:
COLUMBUS, Ohio — An Ohio man could be sentenced to decades in prison after he pleaded guilty Monday to crimes involving child pornography, including using artificial intelligence to create fake images from photos of real children.

title: SBS Japanese News for Tuesday 2 December
description: The federal government has released its national plan for artificial intelligence. Members of a United Nations working group are visiting Australia to assess conditions in immigration detention facilities. And it has been revealed that almost 46,590 student visa cases are currently awaiting review.

title: DIGITIMES ASIA: AI workload surge creates opening for alternative memory and chiplet technologies, expert says
description: TAIPEI, Dec. 2, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- The rapid expansion of artificial intelligence (AI) workloads is forcing a fundamental redesign of data center infrastructure, driving historic memory shortages and opening a rare market window for alternative memory technologies, according to Chuck Sobey, founder of ChannelScience and general chair of the Chiplet Summit.
content: TAIPEI, Dec. 2, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- The rapid expansion of artificial intelligence (AI) workloads is forcing a fundamental redesign of data center infrastructure, driving historic memory shortages and opening a rare market window for alternative mem... [3140 chars]

title: Chula's Deep GI: AI Revolutionizes Gastrointestinal Cancers Detection
description: BANGKOK, Dec. 2, 2025 /PRNewswire/ --The Faculty of Medicine, Chulalongkorn University, in collaboration with the Faculty of Engineering, has developed 'Deep GI,' an artificial intelligence (AI) innovation designed to assist doctors in detecting gastrointestinal cancers with high standard performance equal to that of expert specialists. Trained on hundreds of thousands of endoscopic images, the system has received the Thai FDA approval and is being prepared for national deployment and startup commercialization.
content: BANGKOK, Dec. 2, 2025 /PRNewswire/ --The Faculty of Medicine, Chulalongkorn University, in collaboration with the Faculty of Engineering, has developed "Deep GI," an artificial intelligence (AI) innovation designed to assist doctors in detecting gast... [2450 chars]

title: The Vatican’s voice of reason on artificial intelligence
description: The Vatican is pushing a global conversation on how AI can uphold human dignity and serve the common good, echoing the Church’s historic responses to past technological upheavals.
content:
With artificial intelligence knocking us from our bearings, many are wondering what place humans will have in a technological revolution that is already under way. Societies are dividing, economic models are faltering and politicians are fumbling.

title: Apple AI Head John Giannandrea to leave after chaotic stint; Indian
description: Apple Inc. artificial intelligence head John Giannandrea is stepping down from the role, capping a tumultuous tenure that included a fumbled entry into generative AI.
content:

title: H 1B visa approvals for Indian IT firm plunge by 70% as US tech giants ramp up AI hiring
description: While Indian IT companies pull back from the visa route, US tech giants are pouring billions into artificial intelligence and aggressively hiring foreign-born workers, including fresh graduates, to build AI capabilities at home
content: India’s biggest IT firms secured just 4,573 H-1B approvals for new employment in FY 2025, a 70% collapse from 2015 and down 37% from last year, underscoring a dramatic shift in how global tech talent is flowing into the United States. While Indian IT... [2781 chars]

title: Using AI to decode unstructured data turbocharges productivity
description: Organisations have been turning to artificial intelligence (AI) in the hope of becoming more efficient, productive and customer-centric. However, with data being the fuel that these AI models run on, many companies are not maximising their AI investment returns by only tapping into a portion of their data.
content:
The challenge is how organisations empower their AI models to locate, analyse and use this data from any source within the company.
Achieving this requires more than traditional keyword matching; it demands an AI-driven and contextually aware search ... [4696 chars]

title: Guillermo Del Toro Reviles AI Accepting ‘Frankenstein’ Tribute At Gotham Awards
description: Guillermo del Toro left no doubt about his feelings for artificial intelligence, saying ‘F—k AI” at the Gotham Awards as he received a Tribute for 'Frankenstein'.
content: The renowned director Guillermo del Toro left no doubt about his feelings for artificial intelligence, yelling ‘F—k AI” at the tail end of remarks at the Gotham Awards accepting a Vanguard Tribute for of Frankenstein with stars Jacob Elordi and Oscar... [389 chars]
